RAD_DATASOURCES.RELATION_WITH_PARENT: OLTBS_CONTRACT_BORROWERS.CONTRACT_REF_NO = OLTBS_CONTRACT_BORR_PROD.CONTRACT_REF_NO AND OLTBS_CONTRACT_BORROWERS.CUSTOMER_NO = OLTBS_CONTRACT_BORR_PROD.CUSTOMER_NO AND OLTBS_CONTRACT_BORROWERS.VERSION_NO = OLTBS_CONTRACT_BORR_PROD.VERSION_NO

OLTBS_CONTRACT_BORR_PROD.CONTRACT_REF_NO = OLTBS_BORR_PROD_LIMIT.CONTRACT_REF_NO AND OLTBS_CONTRACT_BORR_PROD.CUSTOMER_NO = OLTBS_BORR_PROD_LIMIT.BORROWER AND OLTBS_CONTRACT_BORR_PROD.LOAN_PRODUCT = OLTBS_BORR_PROD_LIMIT.LOAN_PRODUCT AND OLTBS_CONTRACT_BORR_PROD.VERSION_NO = OLTBS_BORR_PROD_LIMIT.VERSION_NO

RAD_LOVS.LOV_QUERY: SELECT A.CUSTOMER_NO,A.CUSTOMER_NAME1 FROM OLTMS_CUSTOMER A WHERE AUTH_STAT = 'A' AND RECORD_STAT = 'O' ORDER BY A.CUSTOMER_NO

SELECT A.PRODUCT_CODE, A.PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION FROM OLTMS_PRODUCT A, OLVWS_AVL_PROD_BR_USR B, OLTMS_PRODUCT_MASTER_LD C WHERE A.MODULE = 'OL' AND A.PRODUCT_CODE = B.PRODUCT_CODE AND A.ONCE_AUTH = 'Y'AND A.PRODUCT_TYPE = 'L' AND B.BRANCH_CODE = GLOBAL.CURRENT_BRANCH AND B.USER_ID = GLOBAL.USER_ID AND A.PRODUCT_CODE = C.PRODUCT UNION SELECT 'ALL','ALL PRODUCTS' FROM DUAL

SELECT VW.CCY_CODE, CCY.CCY_NAME FROM OLVWS_PRODUCT_CURRENCIES VW, CYTMS_CCY_DEFN CCY WHERE VW.CCY_CODE = CCY.CCY_CODE AND VW.PRODUCT_CODE = DECODE(?,'ALL',?,?) AND CCY.RECORD_STAT = 'O' AND CCY.AUTH_STAT = 'A' UNION SELECT 'ALL','ALL CURRENCIES' FROM DUAL
